message.name: INF_BATCH_FILE_NAME
message.locale: ScanTimeout

message.name: ERR_SCANTIMEOUTS_FILE_OPEN
message.locale: Unable to open ScanTimeout output file.

message.name: INF_TASK_AUTO_REASSIGNED
message.locale: Tasks assigned to %1s are automatically reassigned to %2s.

message.name: ERR_TASK_FV_HOURSWORKED_LOW
message.locale: Hours entered must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_TASK_FV_OWNERTOMANAGERIND
message.locale: The assignee type must be User when setting the task owner to be the supervisor.

message.name: ERR_TASK_NOTHING_TO_MODIFY
message.locale: You have not specified any changes to the task.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CANNOT_REASSIGN_WHEN_COMPLETED
message.locale: Task cannot be reassigned as the task is already completed.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNEE_CONCERNROLE_SENSITIVE
message.locale: The task cannot be assigned to the specified user as they do not have the necessary sensitivity.

message.name: ERR_TASK_CASESECURITY_ASSIGNEE
message.locale: The task cannot be assigned to the specified user as they do not have the necessary security rights for the related case.

message.name: ERR_TASK_FV_ASSIGNEE_EMPTY
message.locale: The assignee's ID and type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSINEE_NOT_CHANGED
message.locale: You must reassign the task to a different assignee.

message.name: ERR_MODIFYOWNERDETAILS_EO_FV_OWNEDBYID_EMPTY
message.locale: The new owner's ID must be specified.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATE_MODIFIERPERMISSION
message.locale: You cannot modify the task as you are not the task owner or assignee

message.name: ERR_VALIDATE_NOCONCERNROLEID
message.locale: You must provide concern role as search criteria.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATE_NOCASEID
message.locale: You must provide case ID as search criteria.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATE_NOCASEID_OR_NOCONCERNROLEID
message.locale: You must provide case ID and concern role as search criteria.

message.name: ERR_TASK_XFV_SPECIFY_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: You must specify some search criteria.

message.name: INF_BPOTASKBO_NO_MATCH
message.locale: No tasks could be found which matched the search criteria.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEINSERT_SYSTEMUSER
message.locale: The Owner or Assignee must not be the SYSTEM user.

message.name: ERR_TASK_EODTLS_FV_SUBJECT_EMPTY
message.locale: Subject must be specified.

message.name: ERR_TASK_EODTLS_FV_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_TASK_EODTLS_FV_PRIORITY_EMPTY
message.locale: Priority must be specified.

message.name: ERR_MODIFYTASKDETAILS_EO_FV_DUEDATE_PAST
message.locale: The deadline cannot be in the past.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEMODIFY_TASKCLOSEDNONMODIFIABLE
message.locale: The task is closed so it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEMODIFYACCEPTEDFLAG_ALREADYACCEPTED
message.locale: The task has already been accepted.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEMODIFYACCEPTEDFLAG_NOTASSIGNEE
message.locale: The task can only be accepted or rejected by its assignee.

message.name: ERR_MODIFYASSIGNEEDETAILS_EO_XFV_SAMEASSIGNEEASBEFORE
message.locale: The new assignee must be different to the current one.

message.name: ERR_MODIFYASSIGNEEDETAILS_CANNOTREASSIGN
message.locale: The task can only be reassigned by its assignee, its owner, or their organization unit managers.
The task can only be reassigned by its assignee, its owner, or their organisation unit managers.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEMODIFYOWNER_RECORDCANCELLEDNONMODIFIABLE
message.locale: The task is canceled so the owner cannot be modified.
The task is cancelled so the owner cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEMODIFYOWNER_TASKCLOSEDNONMODIFIABLE
message.locale: The task is closed so the owner cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_MODIFYOWNERDETAILS_EO_XFV_SAMEOWNERASBEFORE
message.locale: The new owner must be different to the current one.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATECLOSE_TASKALREADYCLOSED
message.locale: The task cannot be closed as it has been closed already.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATECLOSE_CURRENTUSERNOTTASKOWNER
message.locale: You cannot close the task as you are not the task owner.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATECANCEL_RECORDALREADYCANCELLED
message.locale: The task cannot be canceled as it has been canceled already.
The task cannot be cancelled as it has been cancelled already.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATECOMPLETE_ALREADYCOMPLETED
message.locale: The task has already been completed.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATECOMPLETE_TASKCLOSED
message.locale: The task cannot be completed as it has been closed.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEOWNERANDOWNERMANAGER_MODIFIERPERMISSION
message.locale: You cannot modify the task as you are not the task owner or the owner's manager.

message.name: ERR_TASK_FV_STATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: The task cannot be closed during modification. Please select the appropriate operation to close the task.

message.name: INF_TASK_INSERTED
message.locale: Task %1n was inserted by %2s on %3d.

message.name: INF_TASK_ACCEPTED
message.locale: Task %1n was accepted by %2s on %3d.

message.name: INF_TASK_REJECTED
message.locale: Task %1n was rejected by %2s and returned to %3s on %4d.

message.name: INF_TASK_CLOSED
message.locale: Task %1n was closed by %2s on %3d.

message.name: INF_BUSINESSTYPE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Business type changed:

message.name: INF_DUEDATE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Deadline changed:

message.name: INF_PRIORITY_MODIFIED
message.locale: Priority changed:

message.name: INF_SUBJECT_MODIFIED
message.locale: Subject changed:

message.name: INF_TASKSTATUS_MODIFIED
message.locale: Task status was modified during an operation:

message.name: INF_TOTALTIMEWORKED_MODIFIED
message.locale: Total time worked changed:

message.name: INF_TYPE_MODIFIED
message.locale: Task Type changed:

message.name: INF_OWNER_MODIFIED
message.locale: The owner of task %1n was changed from %2s in organization unit %3s to %4s in organization unit %5s.
The owner of task %1n was changed from %2s in organisation unit %3s to %4s in organisation unit %5s.

message.name: INF_TASK_COMPLETED
message.locale: Task %1n was completed by %2s on %3d.

message.name: INF_TASK_REASSIGNED
message.locale: Task %1n has been reassigned.

message.name: INF_COMMENTS
message.locale: Comments: %1s

message.name: ERR_MODIFYTASKDETAILS_EO_FV_HISTORYTEXT_LONG
message.locale: The task history text has exceeded its maximum capacity.

message.name: ERR_TASK_TWO_ASSINEES
message.locale: You can only assign a task to one assignee.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DATE_BLANK
message.locale: You must supply a date if you supply a time.

message.name: ERR_TASK_TIME_BLANK
message.locale: You must supply a valid time if you supply a date.
